info.title: EcoloQuiz API
info.description: API endpoints for EcoloQuiz - Quiz and Player Management System

post.description: Create a new user account and player profile
Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Return the currently authenticated user with roles and player profile

post.description: Invalidate the current token and return a new one

get.description: Retrieve a list of all permissions. Requires permissions.view or permissions.edit permission

post.description: Create a new permission. Requires permissions.create permission

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific permission. Requires permissions.view or permissions.edit permission

put.description: Update an existing permission. Requires permissions.edit permission

delete.description: Delete an existing permission. Requires permissions.delete permission

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all players with their user information, zone, and statistics
Returns detailed information about a specific player
Returns a paginated list of all questions with statistics

post.description: Create a new question for a quiz with answer options

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific question
Retrieve a list of all roles. Requires roles.view or roles.edit permission

post.description: Create a new role with permissions. Requires roles.create permission

get.summary: Get a specific role with permissions
get.description: Retrieve details of a specific role. Requires roles.view or roles.edit permission

put.description: Update an existing role and its permissions. Requires roles.edit permission

delete.description: Delete an existing role. Requires roles.delete permission

description.example: Questions sur les dchets et le recyclage

put.description: Un joueur peut mettre  jour ses propres informations. Un admin peut mettre  jour n'importe quel utilisateur s'il a la permission.

delete.description: Un joueur peut supprimer son propre compte. Un admin peut supprimer un joueur ou un autre admin s'il a la permission.

put.summary: Mettre  jour le mot de passe d'un utilisateur
put.description: Un utilisateur peut changer son propre mot de passe. Un admin peut changer le mot de passe d'un autre admin s'il a la permission.

200.description: Mot de passe mis  jour avec succs

message.example: Mot de passe mis  jour avec succs

put.description: Un admin peut dsactiver un compte joueur s'il a la permission.

get.summary: Obtenir les informations de l'utilisateur connect
get.description: Retourne les informations compltes de l'utilisateur authentifi
